name: GARRY
description:
Help GARRY get his family back!

Garry was turned into a slime by Dr. Kidd. He has decided to infiltrate Dr. Kidd's complex to get back at him. In his way stand three different bosses.

Controls

WASD, arrow keys, or controller D-pad: move, shoot

Down, S, Enter or (A)/(X): skip dialogue
ESC or start button: pause menu
???: skip level

Features
  • 3 levels, each with a unique boss!
  • 5 original songs, totaling over 10 minutes
  • Endless replay value! Unless you get bored!
Gameplay

Garry can only move by shooting in the opposite direction. His bullets deal damage to enemies.

Doors can be opened using a golden key found somewhere in the level.

Each level ranks you based on how quick you are, as well as how good you are at avoiding damage.

Friendly speedrun competition (lasts until August 24th)

Submit your playthrough, preferably in video form, in the comments or to [discord here], if you want your name to appear in one of the categories below (as well as in the game credits):

Fastest play: ???

Careful play (close to 0 damage): ???

???: ???

Credits

Music, Code: lapspider45
Art, Initial Prototype: Mad Monkey Games

Made for LOWREZJAM 2020.
